website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy, functional bucket that many owners find to be worth the splurge due to its effectiveness and ease of use.
pros: Sturdy unit made of strong plastic and steel
Claimed to provide service over 40,000 times
cons: The 26-quart version of this product does not include a bucket for dirty water

customer_reviews.title: Bulletproof.
customer_reviews.text: I have worked in many restaurants and seen what can happen to mop buckets that get used hard on a daily basis. The kind you can find at the big box stores WILL die on you even for simple home use. if you want one that will outlive you, get this model. As an added bonus I didn't realize, this one separates the dirty water from the clean, eliminating the need to mop at the end with just water to remove the dirty water film. it's brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Grillo

customer_reviews.title: Cracked after less than a year
customer_reviews.text: Cracked after less than a year with light household use. For almost $68 I thought Rubbermaid would be better quality than this. Was looking for something commercial quality, thought this was it, apparently not.
customer_reviews.author: BPBomber

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product that works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I thought about buying this Commercial WaveBrake Mopping System for a long time. I finally decided to JUST DO IT and am so glad I did. It works extremely well and facilitates cleaning throughout the house. My only somewhat negative comment is that it is very heavy when filled with water to the half way mark or higher. Solution was simple.... just don't fill it above about 1/2 to 1/3. This is a high quality product at a fair price. The WaveBrake baffles work well to keep the water from sloshing, and the wringer is strong, well designed and probably will last forever. I am a very satisfied customer and recommend the product highly.
customer_reviews.author: SkyKingCFI

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra cost, but the added bucket for the dirty water seems ineffective
customer_reviews.text: I have used other variants of this mop bucket. I was intrigued when I saw the drop in bucket feature to catch the water after being pressed from the mop. I have found that this feature is not helpful for me, as although the bucket catches all the pressed/dirty water from my mop, I now have to empty the bucket more frequently and thus fill the other side up at the same rate. This does help with big messes, but for cleaning a relatively unsoiled floor it seems to add steps that one doesn't wish to take in the monotonousness task of cleaning..
customer_reviews.author: Past_DVO_Present

customer_reviews.title: Well thought out
customer_reviews.text: I had another Rubbermaid mop bucket. The wheels bearings and caster rusted so its stuck solid, the wringing broke and overall terrible. This one is well thought out. The wheels and casters are hard plastics that will withstand chemicals and constantly being wet. The bucket doesn't splash with the new wave blocks. Also comes with a metal handle to pick up the bucket out the mop sink. The wringer is detachable making pouring much easier and lessen the weight. The wringers geometry and perfect create lots of clamping force without you have to push so hard. Overall very satisfied with this mop bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The off grid clothes washin' machine
customer_reviews.text: I too, bought this product to hand wash (wouldn't have it any other way) clothes in the backwards homestead. It is well built and the mop wringer contraption rings clothes to a managable dripless state (with a few presses of the handle) to be hung on the solar/wind powered clothes line. A toilet plunger (agitator) helps with this chore also. This product is very well built and should do meany loads of jeans, sweats , and work clothes without a problem. I guess it would work great for mopping floors also.
customer_reviews.author: Beetlekill

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: I bought a different brand at the hardware store at half the price. I HATED it, it was not worth the savings. This piece is worth every cent. 10 times stronger. The mop is left WAY drier should you want that.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dunne

customer_reviews.title: Recommended, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Smooth wheels, doesn't splash, and love the dirty water bucket. The black color is unobtrusive if customers poke around the back of the restaurant. Only complaint (minor) is that the mop stick rest is on the side, not in the middle, making it harder but not impossible to push the unit through doors. I'm hoping it will last as long as our last Rubbermaid mop bucket, which survived 8 years.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: No more dirty hands!
customer_reviews.text: No more bending over trying to wring a dirty mop. In my 60's and my husband retired, we tend to buy what we need or want. I am not retirement age, but, he is retired. For our last anniversary, I gave the Rubbermaid bucket to my husband, along with a mop. He used it within a few days and said that he wasn't worn out from wringing the mop. He even mopped under the beds, this time, and was proud of his efforts. So was I! My daughter and her husband have different chores in their household. Hope my son-in-law likes his yellow Christmas present. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is great quality as always!
customer_reviews.text: Rubbermaid is great famous brand.As for commercial using,I rather to pay extra to get this instead of similar products. The bucket is nice and wide with a low center-of-gravity. I didn't have the water slosh around too much. The wringer is good quality and did a great job removing the liquid from my 16oz mop head. I didn't have any instructions for the unit, but I think it was pretty self-explanatory for the most part. The casters were pressed in by hand-- all 4 are the same with no locking mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: Aaliyah Miller

customer_reviews.title: Over time this is cheaper and you can clean better.
customer_reviews.text: i use this for my house since i got fed up with all those home-depot and Walmart wringing solutions that always fail after some months. Over time this is cheaper and you can clean better.
customer_reviews.author: HerrKaLeun

customer_reviews.title: Wish I Got This Sooner
customer_reviews.text: Getting a commercial mop bucket for home use may seem like an overkill, let alone a Rubbermaid. But after using it just once on the garage floor, I only wonder what took me so long to get this? The wringer system is so effective it actually took me less time to finish mopping the whole floor. The small hook on the corner of the wringer to support the mop handle when rolling the bucket to another place is a thoughtful design, and I find it very useful.
customer_reviews.author: shu lin

customer_reviews.title: Great at Home
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this and an industrial mop for my home. I was tired of wasting money on residential mops and buckets that break, shed and don't wring out dirty water. I'm very pleased. Makes cleaning my hardwood floor much less of a hassle. Easy to maneuver, wrings perfectly and isn't too heavy to empty.
customer_reviews.author: MLM

customer_reviews.title: Great bucket!
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of the old domestic mop and bucket. We bought a new House last year that’s all wood and tile floors. I’ve gone through different moos and new mop heads and my bucket is old and nasty. I just bit the bullet and bought the professional/industrial mop and bucket with strainer. Works great! If you’re on the fence with getting it, just go for it, you won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: HurleyCub

customer_reviews.title: ... started using it but I can verify that it's great. The only complaint I have is that it ...
customer_reviews.text: I just started using it but I can verify that it's great. The only complaint I have is that it was totally beat up when it was delivered. The box was torn apart and the yellow basket part has scratches all over it. I wasn't concerned because it's a mop bucket but I was disappointed in the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M.

customer_reviews.title: Really good and strong!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I know how it's good and strong, this is our bucket at work in the hotel and casino the Rubbermaid brand... So I searched it on Amazon. I was happy I found this brand and look exactly the same bucket we have and I used at work! All our staff for cleaning is Rubbermaid brand... it worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Lyresh

customer_reviews.title: Messed up wringers
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 13 of them for start up of several accounts. I had ordered them well ahead of time. I did not open the boxes until a month later when we went to start the accounts. 2 of the 13 had issues with the mop wringer. The bar that connects the handle to the moving wringer: 1 was bent and the other not attached at all and I can't get it to attach. Now I want to return them buy my window to return closed 3/12. I'm stuck with 2 I can't use.
customer_reviews.author: CM Indiana

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is the primary cleaner at our house. He requested a "commercial" type mop bucket. I found this and ordered it for him. He has had it for several months now using it weekly. He still comments on how much easier it has made it to mop our 1600 square foot house! If it passed his inspection, it must be good!
customer_reviews.author: rsrandr

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is expensive, who knew a mop bucket could be. However, after much research this was cheapest i could fin. If not rubbermaid it won't last weve tried cheap ones in the restaurant they break, these don't.
customer_reviews.author: JofJds

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty heavy even without the water inside (check the weight ...
customer_reviews.text: Beware: It's pretty heavy even without the water inside (check the weight in specifications). I bought the red dirty water bucket also to keep dirty water separate from the cleaner water. The squeezing mechanism works really well to remove the water from the mop head. Also, the mop head that I use is also pretty heavy, but gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: J A

customer_reviews.title: I really dislike the ringer spring.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because of my age. I have very little strength in my hands. I guess I'm old fashioned and feel like a cotton rag mop is still the most efficient. We have a bucket just like this one at my workplace or at least that was what I thought. however the ringer on the one I purchased is not strong enough to get the water out of the mop. I can do better with my arthritic hands. Both buckets were marked exactly the same but not the same ringer. also they need to design a way to drain it from the bottom. A bit heavy to pick up when full.
customer_reviews.author: joyce bostic

customer_reviews.title: Great industrial grade bucket and wringer, best quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Well, as others have said , this is a solid set, this is the set you see at resteraunts or the one your janitor uses at work or school, its not a knock off home version that is flimsey or a cheap copy..the wave break is awesome for going over the room seperators from floor to carpet without sloshing a drop on to the floor, the wringer is heavy duty and should last a lifetime with normal daily use, This will handle a pretty hefty mop head if you use a full industrial mop as well the average house mop will be fine, the rubber wheels are great and swivel easily and made non marking materials.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: ALL HAIL POSEIDON!
customer_reviews.text: Upon its arrival, this glorious vessel was named after the mighty wavebreaker himself, Poseidon. Sturdy, sexy, and awesome AF, this mop bucket is everything my dirty floors have been dreaming of. Leaving behind nothing but sparkling sanitized surfaces in its wake, Poseidon has purged my house of filth and renewed my courage to hope for a cleaner, better tomorrow. GODS BE PRAISED.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: This bucket/squeeze system is about 3X as expensive as conventional ...
customer_reviews.text: This bucket/squeeze system is about 3X as expensive as conventional systems BUT it is well worth it because (1) it is well made and (2) it has a "step-on" release drain. There is no need to lift or tilt the bucket and therefore no strained backs or similar injuries. In my opinion it is a God-send!
customer_reviews.author: Peter K. Schaffer

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. exceeds my expectations.The ease of utilizing equipment that works. This bucket works. I purchased a mop also that is another sad story. I have a huge sunroom that is a wood look tile. I mop the floor this bucket made the task a breeze. So happy with my Rubbermaid bucket. Now I must fine a great mop handle and mop heads.
customer_reviews.author: nanna BB

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice heavy duty bucket
customer_reviews.text: This mop bucket is the bees knees! It's a nice heavy duty bucket, it's just the right size for smaller areas for quick clean ups and it doesn't "Slosh' around. I like the way the handle compresses so it wrings the mop well. A great purchase for a commercial kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Addie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Industrial grade construction, perfect for large residential and commercial floor spaces
customer_reviews.text: Rather than deal with the Swishers, Sweepers and crap sold in grocery stores I opted for the old fashioned mop & bucket which cuts the cleaning time in half, literally half. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Manbyk

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mop bucket.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent bucket! We recently purchased our home that has tile throughout the house. This bucket makes mopping easy. It moves easy and none marring on it's castors and hold a lot of water. The squeeze handle works as expected and throughly squeezes the excess water from the mop. I do not have any complaints. As good if not better than other professional mop buckets I've used in the past. I like the blue color too!
customer_reviews.author: CraigB

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: The bucket has done what it says. The water stays in the bucke thanks to the baffles. The bucket is super thick but still light weight compared to other buckets. Finally the wheels are very fluid in movement.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: a tough, stable, durable mp bucket at last.
customer_reviews.text: best mop bucket yet. it is low to the ground, so it doesn't tip over easily, plus the larger volume allows for more water to rinse the mop in. The wheels are stronger and wider, they should last longer. Wheel degradation is the main reason I have to buy new mop buckets. This bucket is worth the extra few dollars.
customer_reviews.author: David Ross

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a home!
customer_reviews.text: I was questioning this purchase but my husband suggested for our 2,000 sq foot home that is all stone tile. He was right! It makes mopping go so much easier with a the Rubbermaid commercial mop handle and mop head. I can mop the floor in half the time without having to hand twist a mop. It is easy to adjust how much water gets on the floor and the weight of the mop actually makes it easier. I can easily lift the basin (since you can remove the top) to fill up and dump it is filled only 1/2 or 3/4 full. Wheels make it easy to move. Surprised and relieved how great these work!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah LJ Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Not that great.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t maneuver easily. The red attachable handle won’t stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Hobbky

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction, heavy duty wringer.
customer_reviews.text: Very good heavy duty with a mop wringer you can really lean on. The only issue is that it is a bit unstable, and you really can't lift it straight up by the handle when it is full of water. East to spill if you try, but hey, you got a mop right there.
customer_reviews.author: P. Tato

customer_reviews.title: Super Solid
customer_reviews.text: This thing is plastic solid, i mean solid as solid hard... i was skeptical since i did not want a cheap one. This rubbermaid has exceeded my expectations. Hopefully will last a long time. I will use for my house only but can easily be commercial use. Bonus: no assembly required other than the squezzer removal, which you will remove everytime u empty it and the red handle in the back. 5 sec install lol.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Not a mid-life crisis—I just love mop buckets that don’t break
customer_reviews.text: My husband says I’m having a midlife crisis. I just turned 30 and the best thing that happened to me this month was receiving this mop bucket from Amazon. This is the janitor equipment of my dreams. No more hand-writing my mop or buying buckets that break after 3 months. As the housewife that cleans our hardwood floors that span the entire house, I am very excited to use this.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Great price and good quality for residential and commercial use.
customer_reviews.text: The bucket/mopping system was a steal for the price. Anywhere else, this product will go for a much higher cost. I personally use it for occasional garage mopping after storms and snow so I do not want to spend a lot of money. However, we also use the exact same model at my warehouse, and it does a great job squeezing out the water from all mops. The WaveBreak baffles allow you to push the bucket around with very little splashing.
customer_reviews.author: czerwonymaciek

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking!  They have a better product mop bucket.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work with the red bucket for collecting the dirty water. Product is sturdy but not practical for cleaning. You’ll be using dirty water to rinse the mop? That doesn’t makes sense. Rubbermaid has a better mop bucket. Keep researching your almost there.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: RECOMMENDED FOR HOME USE.
customer_reviews.text: This mop bucket works well....The wringer works well too. The WaveBrake system works to avoid spills on the ground very well. The wheels appear to be made well. I use it in my house, and I would recommend for home use
customer_reviews.author: JOSE A. DUARTE

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra $
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a cheaper model and had to return it. The plastic was bending and my mop head wouldn't fit in the wringer. I decided to take the plunge and spend the extra money. So so happy I did! Well worth spending the extra $20. The difference in everything from the wheels to the wringer is amazing. Spend the extra $ and trust me...it's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: HL

customer_reviews.title: inaccurate description - dirty water bucket does not fit
customer_reviews.text: This item did not fit, although according to the website they are compatible: Rubbermaid Commercial Dirty Water Bucket for WaveBrake 1.0, 35QT Mop Buckets, 18-Quart, Red, (FG9C7400RED). I had to return both. Also, the handle comes out very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: No dirty water bucket, don't be fooled.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this specificially because the description says it has the wavebreak dirty water bucket. It does not. Very disappinted with the false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Dirty water bucket doesn’t come with certain sizes
customer_reviews.text: Advertisement is misleading for the dirty water bucket add-on. It’s only available in certain sizing and doesn’t explain that in the add. In the demo video, it makes it seem like it’s on all sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Call Me King

customer_reviews.title: The heavy duty variety of mop bucket
customer_reviews.text: These rubbermaids are industry standard, I wouldn't buy anything else if you own a cleaning company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must for anyone who uses a mop bucket !
customer_reviews.text: One of the best Mop buckets there is. The splash guard is great ! water doesnt go every where when you move the bucket ! Great design and very nice quality !! Great value on Amazon compared to the home improvement stores !!
customer_reviews.author: R. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is a small version of the standard mop bucket used in hotels and restaurants. It will last a lifetime for home use.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Hard to maneuver at times. The handle is not as sturdy as it could be. This is the 2nd one we have bought and both seem to catch the end of the mop inside the strainer. Not sure why.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S. Merriman

customer_reviews.title: Must have commercial use mop bucket.
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid mop bucket that maneuvers easily. I wouldn’t keep searching....just buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: MattSz

customer_reviews.title: it is very good exercise, and your wife will love you
customer_reviews.text: Makes me feel big and strong and powerful, as I meekly wash the floors.... about 1200 feet of tile (I am not assigned to the rooms that are hard wood). It uses quite a bit of storage space, but most macho things do; much smaller than a tread mill or elliptical trainer, and, if you mop daily, it is very good exercise, and your wife will love you.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Cadillac of Mop Buckets!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased cheaper mop buckets and got tired of them not holding up in a restaurant setting. Got this tank and its the Cadillac of mop buckets, just by looking at you can tell it's a superior product.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Baker

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Bucket
customer_reviews.text: This thing seems almost indestructible. Very strong and durable. Highly recommended providing you have storage space.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Flanigan

customer_reviews.title: Happy day
customer_reviews.text: Bought to mop my art studio floor. Works wonderfully. I added the red dirty water bucket insert and it does its job keeping the clay out of the clean water.
customer_reviews.author: porcelain

customer_reviews.title: Wave Breaker Mop Bucket
customer_reviews.text: This is the one you should get. It's a little big for household use but it works great. Wrings the mop out very nicely and the wave breaker works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: shallowfish

customer_reviews.title: Works really good
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mop bucket. It seemed to be heavy duty and the wringer does a good job getting rid of access water. Unlike the one I had a few years ago that had quite a bit of metal on it that got rusty. Give it some time, I hope I won’t change my opinion...
customer_reviews.author: Fayebirds

customer_reviews.title: For Home or Business use.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product. Reminds me of swabbing the deck as lower enlisted military tend to so often do. Love it and works better than anything you’ll find at walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Wicho

customer_reviews.title: All hardwood and tile floors in this house. This ...
customer_reviews.text: All hardwood and tile floors in this house.This handy bucket saves a lot of time and labor. Well made, should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Gorilla

customer_reviews.title: It works like it should!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this so I could occasionally mop up the garage floor of all the winter salt, sand and crap that melts off the car after driving in snowy weather. Gives me all the water and mop squeezing I need to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Bob T

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT fit red dirty water bucket AS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 35 quart mop bucket which is SUPPOSED to fit with red dirty water bucket for WaveBrake. It definitely does not fit as of January 2019 and I have seen other reviewers say the same.
customer_reviews.author: JohnS

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Sturdy, wringer works beautifully, yet a bit lighter weight than the traditional metal mop bucket. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence R. Holben

customer_reviews.title: Don't go cheap. Buy this.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought cheaper ones at Lowe's and they were aweful! Don't hesitate to buy this if it's what you need. Great quality!!!!
customer_reviews.author: StephyL

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Mop Bucket
customer_reviews.text: This unit is top quality and does what I need it to do, even when I am rough on it. A great product.
customer_reviews.author: James Johnson

customer_reviews.title: You need this if things are a mess!
customer_reviews.text: Its a bucket and a wringer. What can I say? Its very sturdy and probably the only one you'll ever need. Also it wrings out the mop very thoroughly.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Frank

customer_reviews.title: For light use only.
customer_reviews.text: The wringing mechanism failed (metal components) bent after use daily in a small cafe, I would not consider it commercial grade.
customer_reviews.author: Amy H.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what was needed.
customer_reviews.text: I have hard wood floors and many many dogs. Sweeping and mopping is a way of life around my home. This made things so much easier. It's held up well. I LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: This thing is phenomenol
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and the divider in the middle is a genius addition. People with back problems should get this and save yourself all that unneeded extra labor.
customer_reviews.author: Surge

customer_reviews.title: Great and Great
customer_reviews.text: Used for commercial laundry and all the employees love this bucket!!! great for tile floor and employee use where you have a hard time gettting them to use clean water....great quality and heavy build....highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Elad

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for...reliable brand and quality. Other ones on Amazon are pretty garbage (hence the price)
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Love it! A little heavy to lift but that's the whole point ! It's so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Irina Signalova

customer_reviews.title: The suggested dirty bucket does not fit
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased the mop bucket, it recommended the red dirty bucket of which I purchased both. Unfortunately the red dirty is larger in size and does not fir as recommended.
customer_reviews.author: OCS Construction Services, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and functional. Just like the ones that we use at work.
customer_reviews.author: Greg G.

customer_reviews.title: I paid for new got dirty item
customer_reviews.text: I paid for a New Rubbermaid wave breaker mop bucket and it showed sign of use. Our if the box it had black streaks.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Osorio

customer_reviews.title: mop bucket
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for my house. I used to twist the mot until it was as dry as i could get it but it still seemed to stay very wet and it would leave the floors nasty. so i got one of these and its been a life and arm strength saver lol
customer_reviews.author: CrayolaDiana

customer_reviews.title: great for what it was designed to do
customer_reviews.text: great for what it was designed to do. awkward and clunky for home use, but worth it, if you have to clean more frequently due to high traffic-kids or pets.
customer_reviews.author: happygolky

customer_reviews.title: Solid and fuctional
customer_reviews.text: This product is as advertised and perfect for someone who is serious about mopping. The wringer is easy to use and keeps the mop from being too wet.
customer_reviews.author: William Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great home mop bucket.
customer_reviews.text: The small size is great for residential use, I.e. in my home. It just fits better everywhere. Seems just as sturdy as the larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy from an avid mopper.
customer_reviews.text: I am very particular with my mop buckets. I chose this one because it looks sturdy and I love the Rubbermaid brand. Unfortunately after a month of using it the black handle broke. I have no way of reaching the company to find a solution. It is a pain in the butt to use now that the black handle does not raise all the way to the top.
customer_reviews.author: gs

customer_reviews.title: perfect size for large house
customer_reviews.text: Bought this along with the waste water bucket that fits right in. I saw a large supermarket use this same one. It's stands tall so if you need to fill up you can, but if you only need one waste bucket-full of clean water, which is what I use for a 2500square foot home it can manage that as well. Wheels roll easily, cart is not too heavy to move around when empty. When full carry handle is centered so one hand on the handle one hand on the cart and you can hop over stairs carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Kspec

customer_reviews.title: Great mop cart
customer_reviews.text: Makes it easy to mop. Just the description said it came with a bin for dirty water. I didn't get that. But it's very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Time keeper

customer_reviews.title: ... so wrong but to be honest I’m so in love with this bucket
customer_reviews.text: This sound so wrong but to be honest I’m so in love with this bucket. Cleaning is a joy now because of this thing. And no more unpleasant smelly odor because this contraption squeeze the water out.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent traveller

customer_reviews.title: ... for three different pizza locations and they all have loved them. They are sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this three times for three different pizza locations and they all have loved them. They are sturdy and well made. They have yet to break after rigorous use
customer_reviews.author: Erica Inez

customer_reviews.title: Tipy Mop Bucket
customer_reviews.text: Ringer is too heavy and the mop bucket loves to tip over when the mop bucket is empty.
customer_reviews.author: M. Enokizono

customer_reviews.title: Great features.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and features. Rolls easily and has a handy handle for emptying. Can't go wrong on this product.
customer_reviews.author: smokey

customer_reviews.title: It came back!
customer_reviews.text: I returned the mop bucket with three others. This one was returned to me. I do not want it and I have no way of letting anyone know! Help, please send me another return label, the original one is not legible.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Months later, still good
customer_reviews.text: Used multiple times daily in restaurant, still in great shape, and better price than rr supply stores around me.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Jennings

customer_reviews.title: this is what a commercial bucket should be like
customer_reviews.text: Is very sturdy, well made. The wringer is sturdy and well built. i would recommend it to other professionals I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Feels sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Made in the USA and hopefully lasts a long time. Feels nice and seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: SEAN

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I have to mop up after 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I have to mop up after 3 dogs every day and this REALLY makes my life easier! Works great, well made, very thankful for this item.
customer_reviews.author: Odds

customer_reviews.title: It’s a mop bucket what else can I say.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty basic thing nothing crazy I did notice the upgrade on the spring and like the handle that is included for dumping.
customer_reviews.author: George S.

customer_reviews.title: I Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought a bucket to separate out the dirty water. Made cleaning the floors so much easier. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: katja_v

customer_reviews.title: dirty, the box is really bad don't have protection
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 items, and came with defective, dirty, the box is really bad don't have protection.
customer_reviews.author: JOEL MANCIA

customer_reviews.title: Heavy!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, just as described. Heavy duty and durable for commercial kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: db

customer_reviews.title: Great bucket assembly!
customer_reviews.text: I have used mop buckets for years and was always annoyed when I needed to move the bucket and contents would splash out. I was pleasantly surprised how well this bucket keeps its contents inside. I had no need to clean up a splash after moving the bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rolls Royce of mop buckets.
customer_reviews.text: The only mop bucket to use that isn't frustrating or flimsy. I spent the extra 23 bucks to buy the separate dirty water bucket that fits in this one. Nice add on so you are only mopping w clean water. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: your mom

customer_reviews.title: top quality mop bucket
customer_reviews.text: If you like a great quality and sturdy mop bucket, this is it. I love having this at home and would even use it in a professional setting.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Dale Shanklin

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete order
customer_reviews.text: I received this without the dirty water bucket, that was the reason why I convinced myself that this was worth the price. And you don’t need a rubber mase to assemble, you can do it without.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy container; good wringer action
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. I use it to mop my garage floor.
customer_reviews.author: gatsby

customer_reviews.title: dirty water bucket not included.
customer_reviews.text: The product clearly displays in their video and photos a red dirty water bucket attachment. The description of the product talks about, but it is not included. False advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Carol J

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and yet durable/strong
customer_reviews.text: I mop my garage floor in winter. Floor has the epoxy gel coat on it. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.  Sure makes mopping easier.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Bucket mopping isn't very good, the process is not the best. I ordered this, along with some real duty mops, and am quite pleased. Even in a smaller home, this raises the possibility of mopping. Well... in theory, so far. No, I did use it once, but the experience was good enough that I might try it again, soon... probably.
customer_reviews.author: doomdforev

customer_reviews.title: not a good
customer_reviews.text: I own several major franchise restaurants... so I know how long products shld last... I bought this on 11/25/17 the wringer was broken on 2/1/18 not very durable for the 73 bucks... I see they lowered the price a little... anyways.. not a good product
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. I use in the garage to keep garage and shop floors clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Rubbermaid Commercial WaveBrake 2.0 26 QT Side-Press Mop Bucket and Wringer, Yellow (FG748000YEL)
product_meta.description: Size:26 Qt| Color:YellowWith features that surpass traditional mop buckets, the new generation of WaveBrake helps to clean floors with less effort to get the job done safer, without sacrificing quality and durability. Patented WaveBrake baffles result in less splashing while mopping and maneuvering, helping to create a safer environment for patrons and staff. Additionally, water stays in the bucket, eliminating unnecessary trips to the storage closet to fill up the bucket, enhancing productivity. The new generation of the WaveBrake mop bucket is designed to safely empty water with less effort. Integrated handles, sink ledge, and a pout spout provide control while lifting and emptying, for a safe and stable emptying process. Lift and empty the mop bucket easily, with less strain. The new generation WaveBrake wringer is designed and built to the highest of quality standards. WaveBrake wringers have an industry-leading warranty of 5-years, designed to be the best.
feature_bullets: Patented WaveBrake baffles result in 80% less splashing while mopping and maneuvering, helping to create a safer environment for patrons and staff
5-Year Wringer Guarantee the Side-Press and Down-Press Wringers Are Designed to Last 5-Years or 200,000 Cycles
A molded-in pour spout and sink ledge help direct water while emptying the mop bucket
Durable premium tubular steel and structural web molded plastic withstand heavy duty use
Integrated handles help ensure a secure grip to lift and empty the mop bucket
Non-marking casters will not scuff floors to keep them looking their best
Flared wringer design allows mop handle to conveniently rest on the side of the wringer while not in use

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
